snippet: Irad Ortiz Jr. was cleared to ride in Saturday’s Alabama Stakes after hurting his ankle when he was thrown from his mount at Saratoga Race Course on Friday.
abstract: Jockey Irad Ortiz Jr is cleared to ride after injuring his ankle at Saratoga Race Course.
lead_paragraph: Irad Ortiz Jr. was cleared to ride in Saturday’s Alabama Stakes after hurting his ankle when he was thrown from his mount at Saratoga Race Course on Friday.

headline.seo: Injured Jockey Will Return For Alabama Stakes
